title: Cloud-Based Architectural Design Studio: Real-Time Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A professional development program for pre-service or in-service teachers to enhance teaching competencies. Tailored instructional design for professional learners, including the establishment of a cloud-based real-time feedback system and the application of a hybrid offline-online learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can share and collaborate on architectural design models in real-time via cloud-based platforms.
Learners refine design proposals at least three times through non-face-to-face critique sessions with peers and instructors.
Learners complete architectural design proposals integrating spatial organization, structural systems, and aesthetic elements using digital design tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
